arts.ttl: Mallorca make it easy for Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Indeed, van der Heyden hadn’t started a game for Mallorca since their cup run at the beginning of the year, and has spent more time on the bench than Judge Rinder! Mallorca coach Jagoba Arrasate’s men never looked like they’d got over the 1-5 gubbing from Barcelona on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Iago Aspas inspires Celta Vigo to end La Liga losing streak v Mallorca
arts.sum: Celta Vigo have returned to winning ways with a 2-0 home La Liga victory over Mallorca in Galicia. The hosts were aiming to bounce back, following a difficult November, and three points on the board, nudges them up to 10th in the table. In a first half of few chances, Celta Vigo took advantage of […] The post Iago Aspas inspires Celta Vigo to end La Liga losing streak v Mallorca appeared first on Football España.
Joe Champion has provided a score prediction for all 10 matches taking place in LaLiga on Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday.

arts.ttl: Mallorca star Mojica goes from hero to zero
arts.sum: Jesus opens the door and says “What did you bring, Mark?” The invitation (for season ticket holders only in the form of a draw) includes a return flight on the team’s plane, transfers from the airport to the meeting point and back, and admission to the game for the semifinal and a possible final.

Celta ended a three-game winless run with a 7-0 Copa Del Rey thrashing of Salamanca in midweek and they'll look to build upon that result here. Mallorca, meanwhile, were battered 5-1 by Barcelona on ...
